org.anddev.andengine.engine
Class FixedStepEngine

java.lang.Object
  org.anddev.andengine.engine.Engine
      org.anddev.andengine.engine.FixedStepEngine
All Implemented Interfaces:
ITouchController.ITouchEventCallback, TimeConstants
public class FixedStepEngine
extends Engine

A subclass of Engine that tries to achieve a specific amount of updates per second. When the time since the last update is bigger long the steplength, additional updates are executed.
(c) 2010 Nicolas Gramlich
(c) 2011 Zynga Inc.

Since:
10:17:47 - 02.08.2010
Author:
Nicolas Gramlich
